attributes.description:
THIS REGAL STYLING BENTLEY IS IN AN  IMMACULATE CONDITION AND BOASTS WITH STUNNING COMFORT FEATURES:
-RED/BLACK ON RED LEATHER.
-21" WHEELS.
-PARKING DISTANCE CONTROL (PDC) FRONT & REAR.
-REAR ENTERTAINMENT,WITH DVD, USB/AUX CONNECTIVITY AND HEADSETS.
-REAR BLIND
-ALL SEATS ARE HEATED/COOLING AND  HAVE MASSAGE FUNCTION.
-SUNROOF TILT/SLIDE
-KEYLESS ENTERY
-REAR VANITY TRAYS.
-BAR FRIDGE.
-INDIVIDUAL REAR SEAT ADJUSTABLE, ELECTRICALLY OPERATED.
-FRONT AND REAR DUAL CLIMATE CONTROL.
-REMOTE ACCESS TO CONTROL SETTINGS FROM REAR.
-MULTIFUNCTION STEERING WHEEL WITH PADDLE SHIFT.
-SUSPENSION COMFORT ADJUSTMENT AND MUCH MORE. CALL US TODAY TO MAKE THIS LUXURY CAR YOURS.FINANCE AVAILABLE.TRADE INS WELCOME. OPTIONS FOR EXTENDED WARRANTY.
